title: Error when starting up thunderbird
content:
I get this error when I start up Thunderbird on my Desktop PC but not on my Laptop.

Mozilla Thunderbird ESR

Thunderbird The current operation on 'INBOX' did not succeed. The mail server for account sotackd@gmail.com responded: [NONEXISTENT] Unknown

However once this is cleared my Gmail and Thunderbird work perfectly.

Please see attached info.
creator: sotackd

title: Calendar event reminder display size
content: Calendar event reminders show in a full page. How do I revert it to an adjustable size (vertical and horizontal)?
